name: linen ridge dishcloth
notes:
this tunisian crochet dishcloth is in my all-new linen ridge stitch pattern. it has a delightful texture that you and all your friends and family are going to love.

>this pattern is available for free on my website [here][1]. if you prefer, a pdf is also available for purchase. 


  [1]: https://makeitcrochet.com/linen-ridge-dishcloth-free-tunisian-crochet-pattern/
